title: Dad Jokes Birthday Gift Book
description: Laughter is the very best gift that we can give someone for their birthday. Since Ralph Lane is the King of Dad Jokes, this Dad jokes book is bound to be a favorite birthday gift. With over 100 hilarious dad jokes, this Birthday Gift Book is sure to please birthday celebrants of all ages. Boys and girls, men and women will love this book and keep it in a treasured location such as their antique mahogany bookshelf or the back of their toilet.What makes Ralph Lane joke books so popular? Well, besides the very best jokes of all time, this and other Ralph books are illustrated on each page providing that added hilarity to an already hilarious treasure trove of classical literary buffoonery. Not only are the jokes guaranteed to brighten up your day, but as soon as you’re finished reading this book, you’ll want to rush right out and buy some of Ralph’s other witty classics including:Dad Jokes Gift Book (the original) by Ralph LaneMother’s Day Gift Book by Ralph LaneDad Jokes Halloween Gift Book by Ralph LaneDad Jokes Christmas Gift Book by Ralph LaneDad Jokes Valentine’s Day Gift Book by Ralph LaneDad Jokes St. Patrick’s Day Gift Book by Ralph LaneDad Jokes Easter Gift Book by Ralph LaneObviously the Dad Jokes Birthday Gift Book makes a great birthday gift for Dad, but it also makes the best birthday present for friends, siblings, Mom, neighbors, teachers, uncles and aunts. It ranks near the top of books that make good gifts and right at the top of funny gifts for husbands. Order multiple copies of these birthday joke books and keep them on hand as humorous gifts for friends and relatives.
author: Ralph Lane
